name: Chernomoi
description: A tiny fey creature with exceptional agility and magical abilities, possessing a scimitar and capable of flight.
memorable: The Chernomoi can emit a loud, disruptive shriek affecting multiple foes.
goals: To manipulate situations through cunning and magic, often playing both mischievous and helpful roles.
relations: Related to other fey creatures and potentially encountered alongside them.
environment: Typically found in magical or enchanted locations.
strengths: Possesses high Dexterity and Constitution, making it agile and resilient in combat.
weaknesses: Very low Strength, making it vulnerable in physical confrontations requiring brute force.
attacks: Melee attacks with a scimitar dealing slashing damage; disruptive thunder damage from its shriek.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to emit a shriek that causes thunder damage to nearby foes.
senses: Has darkvision allowing it to see in low-light conditions.
skills: Skilled in Acrobatics and Stealth, enabling nimble movements and the ability to go unnoticed.
additional_information: Resistant to nonmagical physical damage not made with silvered weapons.
Capable of casting various utility spells at will.
Can detect magic and identity of poisons with spellcasting abilities.
May engage in both combat and supportive spellcasting roles.
Has a notably high Dexterity score granting a +4 modifier.
spellcasting: Can cast utility spells at will as well as some once per day, focusing on information gathering and utility.
test_queries: tiny mischievous fey that can fly
scimitar wielding fey creature with magical abilities
resilient fey that shrieks thunder damage
